# AVMetadataSalientObject

**Class**

An object representing a single salient area in a picture.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMetadataSalientObject
```

## Overview

This object is an immutable type that describes the various features of the salient object in a picture.

## Inspecting metadata

- **objectID**: An integer value that defines the unique identifier of an object in a picture.

## Inherits From

- AVMetadataObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
